UtSortedMatcher
UtMatcher
UtSortedMatcher

Matches on the sorted version of the returned list.

Globals
Functions
ut sorted
ut sorted(
UtMatcher matcher 
)

Sorts a list before passing to inner matcher.

Factory function for UtSortedMatcher.

Example
ut assert that( Expr( {3,2,1} ), ut sorted( {1,2,3} ) );
